LeaderBrand team proud to show PM around new facility https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/14/leaderbrand-team-proud-to-show-the-pm-around-new-facility/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/14/leaderbrand-team-proud-to-show-the-pm-around-new-facility/ The Prime Minister toured LeaderBrand's Gisborne operation when he was here this week. Fri, 13 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 In LeaderBrand's 11ha undercover greenhouse at Makauri on Thursday (from left) are East Coast MP Dana Kirkpatrick, LeaderBrand general manager production Richard McPhail, Prime Minister Christopher Luxon, LeaderBrand general manager farm Gordon McPhail and greenhouse manager Billy Stackhouse.
Whānau tribute in memory of Gisborne woman Midge Te Kani https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/14/whanau-tribute-in-memory-of-gisborne-woman-midge-te-kani/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/14/whanau-tribute-in-memory-of-gisborne-woman-midge-te-kani/ James Pocock'Let’s carry on Mum’s legacy by striving to work hard, care for others and smile more.' Fri, 13 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Midge Te Kani at work in the marae. Jacqueline Nankivell said her mum will be remembered for her work ethic, her ability to bring people together, creating and maintaining connections between whānau and iwi. Photo / Te Kani-Nankivell whānau
Northland loses legendary kiwi Sir Ed to ferret attack https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-loses-legendary-kiwi-sir-ed/PHHQ4CGGVJCG7BRC7ZALMQNNAE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-loses-legendary-kiwi-sir-ed/PHHQ4CGGVJCG7BRC7ZALMQNNAE/ Sarah CurtisA 20-year-old kiwi, father to numerous offspring, has been found dead on Matakohe Island. Fri, 13 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Legendary Northland kiwi Sir Ed is dead but his offspring live on. Sir Ed was known to have fathered at least 10 chicks during his 20 years on Matakohe Island, an ecosanctuary in the Whangārei Harbour. Two of them are pictured here.

Fri, 13 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Tenby Powell donated 16 ambulances to Ukrainian medical services during a ceremony in the capital Kyiv.
